long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hey MTI students! Explore our new tool that instantly calculates your Cumulative GPA and Semester GPA when you open your grades page. It provides valuable insights including total semesters, best and worst semesters, total courses taken, and your top and bottom performing courses. Gain detailed insights into your academic journey effortlessly.
